translation.Message_0_Page_0: We're here after something happened in the Marseille Safezone.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: All we know is the location has been irradiated, and my remaining men piled into a Maelstrom and fled.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: We managed to pick up a few survivors along the way.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: This fort will be our base of operations until it is safe enough to establish a foothold on the mainland.
